```{r}
#Importing Data
library(readr)
temp <- tempfile()
download.file("https://www.fhwa.dot.gov/bridge/nbi/2018hwybronefiledel.zip",temp)
data <- read_delim(unz(temp, "2018HwyBridgesDelimitedAllStates.txt"), ",", col_names = T)
unlink(temp)
str(data)
tail(data)
```
